summary: This is an email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend informational meetings in New York and Florida about available victim services. The email provides details about two scheduled meetings in October 2019 and requests RSVPs from interested victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to attend FBI victim services meetings.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Meeting - New York
events.description: Scheduled meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services from FBI Victim Services representatives, FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Meeting - Florida
events.description: Scheduled meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services from FBI Victim Services representatives, FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Invitation Sent
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division sends email invitations to victims of Jeffrey Epstein about upcoming informational meetings.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019 to provide information about available services.
Two informational meetings were scheduled for October 2019 - one in New York on October 15 and one in Florida on October 23.
The invitation indicates an active FBI investigation into Jeffrey Epstein (Case Number: NY-3027571) was ongoing at that time.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the meetings.
The email demonstrates coordinated efforts between the FBI Victim Services Division, FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
